articles.author: Rakesh Patil
articles.title: Broader indices underperform, but these 10 smallcaps post double digit gain - Moneycontrol
articles.description: The consolidation is a brief pause in the overall uptrend, and we expect the up move to resume during the coming week, says Jatin Gedia – Technical Research Analyst at Sharekhan by BNP Paribas.
articles.content: The Indian market had a positive run for the fourth week in a row, with the benchmark indices reaching an all-time high despite high volatility in the week ending on March 7. However, the broader ind… [+4591 chars]

articles.title: Bus-Size Asteroid Flew Closer Than The Moon - Watch The Orbit Animation - video Dailymotion - Dailymotion
articles.description: Asteroid 2024 DW flew about 139,000 miles (224,000 km) away from Earth. The space rock was estimated to be about 43 feet wide (13 m).   Credit: Space.com | animation: NASA/JPL-Caltech | edited by Steve Spaleta Music: Black Bullet by Deskant / courtesy of Epid…
